summary: Adds a whole new continent to explore with roughly around 1 hour of content
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE:
I have quit working on this mod all together. I just have no real need or desire to continue making it.
The lore wasn't very beliveable or friendly with normal TES lore.
I have improved much since this mod.



[color=#006400]THIS MOD IS A W.I.P MEANING IT HAS SOME GLITCHES AND COMPATABILITY ISSUES[/color]

[color=008000]Story:[/color]

During the Late Menethic Era..
The Atmorans began invasion on Black Marsh

And as such a group of Argonians(100 Argonians) Left their home of blackmarsh and set sail on the sea.
They were ran by Ynshal Ironfist. A wise argonian

After long exploration they found a mysterious Island.
However the Atmorans killed almost all of the Argonians of Ynshal as they were on the border of this strange land. And as only Ynshal,and his 4 Men

However Ynshal died on shore.

And as the Fourth Wind Broze and the First Era began

The land would be called Fourthwind.
And the first boat for 200 years Is heading here(Near Solitude just travel to Boat to Fourthwind)

[color=008000]Installation:[/color]

Drag the Fourthwind.esp in the .zip into your Data folder
NOTE!

Your load order MUST BE LIKE THIS:

Skyrim.esm
Fourthwind.esp
Other Mods below Here

Or else it WILL NOT WORK!
author: Japanga
